meanings.definition: The leader of a clan or tribe.
meanings.sent1: The chieftains gathered the clan for a meeting.
meanings.sent2: The chieftains made important decisions for the tribe.
meanings.sent3: The chieftains tried to settle a dispute over who ate the last berry.
meanings.sent4: The chieftains' wisdom guided the tribe through difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The chieftains' authority was unquestioned among the people.

meanings.definition: A person in a position of leadership or authority.
meanings.sent1: The company chieftains discussed the new business strategy.
meanings.sent2: The political chieftains debated the proposed law changes.
meanings.sent3: The chieftains of the school council planned a fun event for the students.
meanings.sent4: The chieftains of the team motivated their players to give their best.
meanings.sent5: The community chieftains worked together to improve the neighborhood.
